name: The Eerie Inn VR
description: The Eerie Inn is a mystery, puzzle-solving horror VR game with a strong emphasis on the narrative. You play as one of the girls staying at a guest house and your mission is to find out the truth behind the mysterious things happening there. You will soon realize that things aren't what they appear to be..
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 or equivalent Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX 970 / AMD R9 290 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2300 MB available space
